person.persName: Elbridge Jackson Brodus (Madison County, lawyer and soldier)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, lawyer. Madison County native. Son of Andrew Brodus and Grace Brodus. Married to Ann B. Chambers Brodus on August 5, 1861. Father of Joseph Brodus. Student in Madison County in 1850. Household owned eleven enslaved persons in Madison County in 1850. Attended Georgetown College. Lawyer in Madison County from 1858.
